body: The translation is bad. Like, the translator translated "I want to make you cum" as "I want to cum" on pg 19.

Lowkey kinda ruined it with the ntr

It's really funny how the ntr authors always have god tier art haha, i mean i'm not into ntr but i end up fapping to it just because of how good the art is compared to some vanilla stuff, though this author is great because he has both vanilla and ntr so it's up to the reader, but yeah this story has the most retarded ending i've ever seen.
boku no yayoi san @gerardo1k. THats whats its called
if anyone still reading whats the animation called

After Reading the way it ended i still ask , why did he make the manga go down this route and not just stop at chapter 3 where everyone loved it. And even if he continued it why end it in such a stupid way , i mean the anime had a better ending than Hurr my dick ain't enough so i'll get my friends to come fuck her and i wont even touch her. Its not depressing or infuriating its just stupid. Love the Art but man did this story go to shot real fast.
This has been animated and it's not for the faint of heart

Just be thankful they stopped translating there. There are 4 more chapters and sorry to say that it only gets worse and weirder fetishes. In fact there are only 49 good pages out of 246. the last 2 pages from 244 to 246 could be added after page 49 and we could pretend the story is vanilla lol
hey where are the 4th and 5th chapters??

God. it almost seems like authors think that what they're writing is too shallow so they want to throw in a betrayal but it's not fucking clever... EVERYONE DOES IT IT STILL SHALLOW. either that or japan is just full of cucks
